name: Slyle and Baldr's Fun Day
description:
A short game I made in a day to practice using ren'py, featuring characters from one of my other projects!

  • Made all in one day, so as one may guess, it won't take long to play through the whole thing
  • Two endings, a good one and the true one
  • No sound whatsoever
  • All visuals are just kinda placeholders? The project these characters come from won't have a visual aspect, so there's no canon designs. These are just sillhouettes.
  • Critiques on the overall quality are more than welcome, as I'm planning on making much bigger visual novels in the future and would like to do those justice. (Although I didn't exactly put my full potential into the art as I'm just setting out to practice coding in ren'py with this... I can practice drawing whenever I want)
